Keywords: Cosmic , Imperial Guard , Ruler , Shi'ar , Soldier
Real Name: Kallark
Special Powers
TARGETING: Destroy Blocking
RELUCTANT MAJESTOR OF THE SHI'AR EMPIRE: Leadership, Mastermind. When Emperor Gladiator uses Leadership and succeeds, you may instead generate a XMRF #009 Shi'ar Soldier on click #1. // Friendly characters with the Shi'ar keyword that occupy or are adjacent to 1+ Shi'ar Flag light object modify damage +1.
YOU CAN'T HURT ME BECAUSE I BELIEVE YOU CAN'T HURT ME: When Emperor Gladiator hits, give him a Confidence token [MAX:1]. // If Emperor Gladiator has a Confidence token, he can reduce penetrating damage. // When Emperor Gladiator would take damage, he may instead remove a Confidence token to take no damage.

Already in love with both of the Gladiators for this set.
